lyrics.text:
Sīsū ko e maama koe
‘Oku lelei fai ma’u ai pē,
‘A ia ‘oku ulo ai,
‘A e lelei ‘o e Tamai.

’I māmani ‘i lalo ni
Mo e langi ‘i ‘olunga,
‘Eiki Sīsū ko koe pē,
Ko homau mālōlō’anga.

‘Eiki tuku kiate au,
‘A e loto fa’a kātaki,
‘A e me’a kehekehe,
Kuo hoko kiate au.

Ko e ipu ‘oku ke teu,
Te u ma’u pea u fakafeta’i;
Kuo ke felingiaki,
‘Eiki, ‘i ho’o poto lahi.

‘Oku ifo tamala pē,
Ki he ngutu, pea kona,
Ka ‘oku ngāue mālohi,
Ki he laumālie vaivai.

Pea u longo mate pē au;
Pea ko e loto lāunga,
‘E mole ‘o ngata ia,
Pea mo e manavahē.

Mo e tokanga mamahi,
Mo e loto manavasi’i,
‘E puna hangē ko e ‘ao
‘I he la’ā ho’atā.
